backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Nebacrypt backend, defining project submission management, user profile CRUD, access control, blob storage, and messaging functionality with Norwegian-language error messages.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a single implemented feature: reordering a footer element in Footer.tsx so it appears above the address/contact block, with high confidence and one test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source files to short human-readable summaries describing each component's purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Norwegian language, SEO meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter Card metadata, a vector favicon, and a root div that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing page navigation, scroll targeting, loading state, theme, and conditional profile setup modal for authenticated users without an existing profile.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying the Nebacrypt logo, copyright/caffeine.ai attribution bar (positioned above the address block), and Nebadon Encryption AS contact details.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky responsive navigation header with text-only home button, desktop nav links, Internet Identity login/logout with tooltip, and a mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Full-screen loading overlay showing the Nebacrypt logo with a pulse animation, a CSS spinning ring, and the Norwegian text 'Laster inn...'.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog component that collects name, email, and optional company from new users to create their profile, using the useCreateUserProfile mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/PublicSubmission: A public-facing project submission form that collects client details, project description, timeline, and budget, with a success state and an Internet Identity login section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing admin access control if a token is present and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile CRUD, project submission, and message/file operations, using the useActor hook to access the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines a Nordic-themed color palette with CSS custom properties for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays all project submissions in a table, allows status management (reviewed, followup, inProgress, completed), messaging, and adding delivery links, with admin-only access enforced via a caller check.
frontend/src/pages/ClientPortal.tsx: Client portal page where authenticated users (via Internet Identity) can submit projects, view their project statuses with badges, and exchange messages with admins.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page displaying the company hero section, services cards, and 'why choose us' items, with smooth-scroll support for services and contact sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radius variables, accordion keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking schema version, existing features, and the current task: moving a footer element above the address/contact block in the Footer component.
